name: font-family
help: Specifies the font family for text

name: font-size
help: Specifies the font size of text

name: font-weight
help: Specifies the weight of a font

name: font-style
help: Specifies the font style for text

name: font-size-adjust
help: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs

name: color
help: Sets the color of text

name: text-transform
help: Controls the capitalization of text

name: text-decoration
help: Specifies the decoration added to text

name: letter-spacing
help: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text

name: word-spacing
help: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text

name: line-height
help: Sets the line height

name: text-align
help: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text

name: vertical-align
values: baseline | sub | super | top | text-top | middle | bottom | text-bottom |<percentage>|<length>|inherit
help: Sets the vertical alignment of an element

name: direction
help: Specifies the text direction/writing direction

name: background-color
help: Sets the background color of an element

name: background-image
help: Sets the background image for an element

name: background-repeat
help: Sets how a background image will be repeated

name: background-position
values: [ [<percentage>|<length>| left | center | right ] [<percentage>|<length>| top | center | bottom ]? ] | [ [ left | center | right ] || [ top | center | bottom ] ] |inherit
help: Sets the starting position of a background image

name: background-attachment
help: Sets whether a background image is fixed or scrolls with the rest of the page

name: opacity
help: Sets the opacity level for an element

name: width
help: Sets the width of an element

name: height
help: Sets the height of an element

name: top
help: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

name: right
help: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

name: bottom
help: Specifies the bottom position of a positioned element

name: left
help: Specifies the left position of a positioned element

name: margin-top
help: Sets the top margin of an element

name: margin-right
help: Sets the right margin of an element

name: margin-bottom
help: Sets the bottom margin of an element

name: margin-left
help: Sets the left margin of an element

name: padding-top
help: Sets the top padding of an element

name: padding-right
help: Sets the right padding of an element

name: padding-bottom
help: Sets the bottom padding of an element

name: padding-left
help: Sets the left padding of an element

name: box-shadow
help: Attaches one or more drop-shadows to the box

name: border-top-width
help: Sets the width of the top border

name: border-right-width
help: Sets the width of the right border

name: border-bottom-width
help: Sets the width of the bottom border

name: border-left-width
help: Sets the width of the left border

name: border-top-color
help: Sets the color of the top border

name: border-right-color
help: Sets the color of the right border

name: border-bottom-color
help: Sets the color of the bottom border

name: border-left-color
help: Sets the color of the left border

name: border-top-style
help: Sets the style of the top border

name: border-right-style
help: Sets the style of the right border

name: border-bottom-style
help: Sets the style of the bottom border

name: border-left-style
help: Sets the style of the left border

name: border-radius
help: Sets the radius of the border corners

name: position
help: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)

name: display
values: inline | block | list-item | inline-block | table | inline-table | table-row-group | table-header-group | table-footer-group | table-row | table-column-group | table-column | table-cell | table-caption | none |inherit
help: Specifies the type of box an element should generate

name: visibility
help: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

name: z-index
help: Sets the stack order of a positioned element

name: overflow-x
help: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

name: overflow-y
help: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

name: white-space
help: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled

name: clip
help: Clips an absolutely positioned element

name: float
help: Specifies whether or not a box should float

name: clear
help: Specifies which sides of an element where other floating elements are not allowed

name: cursor
values: [ [<uri>,]* [ auto | crosshair | default | pointer | move | e-resize | ne-resize | nw-resize | n-resize | se-resize | sw-resize | s-resize | w-resize | text | wait | help | progress ] ] |inherit
help: Specifies the type of cursor to be displayed

name: list-style-image
help: Specifies an image as the list-item marker

name: list-style-position
help: Specifies if the list-item markers should appear inside or outside the content flow

name: list-style-type
values: disc | circle | square | decimal | decimal-leading-zero | lower-roman | upper-roman | lower-greek | lower-latin | upper-latin | armenian | georgian | lower-alpha | upper-alpha | none |inherit
help: Specifies the type of list-item marker

name: marker-offset
help: #N/A
#N/A
